name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs 'DIAMOND GIRLFRIEND' featuring MOTSU as the finale of her 2025 birthday live.
IRyS promotes her upcoming EP 'YaBA!' and explains the contents of the different editions.
Credits roll for the 'HOPE UPON A STAR' birthday live with background music.

subtitles.original: Trust me, your weary eyes betray what you've tried to hide
subtitles.english: Trust me, your weary eyes betray what you've tried to hide

subtitles.original: まぶしさで目が眩むGem
subtitles.english: A dazzling Gem that blinds you

subtitles.original: 言葉無しで伝われ
subtitles.english: Let it reach you without words

subtitles.original: Trust me, I'll never shy away from your dark side
subtitles.english: Trust me, I'll never shy away from your dark side

subtitles.original:
The CD for my new EP, YaBA!, will be open
for pre-orders after this.
subtitles.english:
The CD for my new EP, YaBA!, will be open
for pre-orders after this.

subtitles.original:
It includes the new song DIAMOND GIRLFRIEND
that I just performed featuring MOTSU-san.
subtitles.english:
It includes the new song DIAMOND GIRLFRIEND
that I just performed featuring MOTSU-san.

subtitles.original:
There are two versions that will be available
for purchase, the YaBA KAWAII edition
subtitles.english:
There are two versions that will be available
for purchase, the YaBA KAWAII edition

subtitles.original: and the YaBA CHIC edition.
subtitles.english: and the YaBA CHIC edition.

subtitles.original:
The YaBA KAWAII jacket illustration is drawn
by maesjuw-san,
subtitles.english:
The YaBA KAWAII jacket illustration is drawn
by maesjuw-san,

subtitles.original:
and the YaBA CHIC jacket illustration is drawn
by SYAGAMU-san.
subtitles.english:
and the YaBA CHIC jacket illustration is drawn
by SYAGAMU-san.

subtitles.original:
The jackets are reversible, so you will be able to
switch between the two no matter which version you buy.
subtitles.english:
The jackets are reversible, so you will be able to
switch between the two no matter which version you buy.

subtitles.original: Both jackets are absolutely adorable!
subtitles.english: Both jackets are absolutely adorable!

subtitles.original:
The main difference between the two versions
are the sticker set designs that will be included.
subtitles.english:
The main difference between the two versions
are the sticker set designs that will be included.

subtitles.original: Both sets are drawn by LIEN-sensei.
subtitles.english: Both sets are drawn by LIEN-sensei.

subtitles.original:
There are two different types of stickers
included with each EP version.
subtitles.english:
There are two different types of stickers
included with each EP version.

subtitles.original:
One of which is a larger size and waterproof, so
it would be great if you could put it on your car.
subtitles.english:
One of which is a larger size and waterproof, so
it would be great if you could put it on your car.

subtitles.original:
The other is a smartphone size, so you can take
it with you wherever you go.
subtitles.english:
The other is a smartphone size, so you can take
it with you wherever you go.

subtitles.original:
Also, the alternate jacket may have a
handwritten signature on it, so please look forward to it!
subtitles.english:
Also, the alternate jacket may have a
handwritten signature on it, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: This EP is packed with Euro sounds,
subtitles.english: This EP is packed with Euro sounds,

subtitles.original:
I'm really looking forward to sharing them all
with you and I hope you buy a copy.
subtitles.english:
I'm really looking forward to sharing them all
with you and I hope you buy a copy.

subtitles.original:
Stay tuned after the credits for the DIAMOND
GIRLFRIEND MV premiere,
subtitles.english:
Stay tuned after the credits for the DIAMOND
GIRLFRIEND MV premiere,

subtitles.original:
and I'll see you guys in the members only part 2!
Woo!
subtitles.english:
and I'll see you guys in the members only part 2!
Woo!
